text: The Cupa Ligii Final was the final match of the 2014–15 Cupa Ligii, played between Steaua București and Pandurii Târgu Jiu. Steaua București won the match with 3–0. == Match == {| width=92% | |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||1 || Florin Niță |- |RB ||6 || Paul Papp |- |CB||30 || Gabriel Tamaș |- |CB ||5 || Srdjan Luchin |- |LB ||14 || Iasmin Latovlevici |- |DM||26 || Ionuț Neagu || |- |DM||21 || Nicandro Breeveld || |- |RW||7 || Alexandru Chipciu (c) |- |AM||9 || Gabriel Iancu || || |- |LW||94 || Rareș Enceanu || || |- |FW||29 || George Țucudean || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |RW||77 || Adrian Popa || || |- |FW||25 || Raul Rusescu || || |- |CB||97 || Robert Vâlceanu || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Constantin Gâlcă |} |valign="top"| | style="vertical-align:top; width:50%;"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||80 || Pedro Mingote |- |RB ||18 || Bogdan Ungurușan |- |CB ||3 || Andrei Cordoș || || |- |CB ||6 || Nikola Vasiljević |- |LB ||4 || Marko Momčilović || |- |DM||19 || Paul Anton (c) |- |DM||24 || Filip Mrzljak || || |- |RW||8 || Mihai Răduț |- |AM||10 || Dan Nistor |- |LW||26 || Viorel Nicoară || || |- |FW||99 || Deivydas Matulevičius || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |CB||20 || Bogdan Șandru || || |- |RW||7 || Alin Buleică || || |- |AM||11 || Eric || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Eduard Iordănescu |} |- |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | width=50% valign=top| MATCH OFFICIALS *Assistant referees: ** Adrian Ghinguleac ** Mircea Grigoriu *Fourth official: ** Marcel Bîrsan *Additional assistant referees: ** ** | width=50% valign=top| MATCH RULES *90 minutes. *30 minutes of extra-time if necessary. *Penalty shoot-out if scores still level. *Seven named substitutes. *Maximum of three substitutions. |} ==References== ==External links== * Official site 2015 Category:2014–15 in Romanian football 2015
title: 2015 Cupa Ligii Final
